level.text: A commissioned officer may be honorably discharged:
Upon disbandment of the organization to which he belongs; or
Upon report of a board of examination, or for failure to appear before such board when ordered.
He may be dismissed upon the sentence of a court-martial, or conviction in a court of justice of an infamous offense.
